title: What’s a secret you kept from your parents in high school? - Quora

response.answer_text: What didn't I keep from them. I came from a family of devout Seventh Day Adventists. My father was severe in his punishment, as was my mother. I did everything that they preached was bad. I did get caught at times and punished in cruel ways. I left home at 18 and never looked back. I have raised my son's to know that mistakes are okay, they tell me everything. Right or wrong I will always be there with love to help them.
